title: 10: S3E10 - "Dreadful Decisions" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Cole Long, Dan David, The Dead Canary, and Absinthe Rose, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about cryptic calls, nefarious neighbors, drug-induced dread, and terrifying trees. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s3e10
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
